## Report Details

Please provide details about the Code of Conduct violation. This report will be kept confidential and handled according to our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) enforcement guidelines.

### Incident Description

Describe the incident that occurred, including:

- When and where it happened (GitHub issue/PR/discussion, Discord, etc.)
- Who was involved
- What was said or done

### Evidence

Please provide links to or descriptions of evidence:

- GitHub issue/PR/discussion links
- Message timestamps
- Screenshots (if appropriate)
- Other relevant details

### Impact

Describe how this behavior impacted you or the community.

### Contact Information

Your contact information for follow-up (optional but recommended):

- Email:
- GitHub username:
- Preferred contact method:

---

**Privacy Notice**: This report will be handled confidentially. Only the maintainers responsible for Code of Conduct enforcement will have access to this information.
